attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support the supreme all-powerful Donny Trumpet and it was fun for the first few minutes. As time went on I noticed a strange orange color begin to slowly grow all over my skin😟. Before I knew it, I was shrinking and my skin became coarse. I HAD BECOME AN ORANGE. So here I am rolling back and forth on the ground trying to type out this review in hopes that someone will come help me delete this app and reverse the curse✨🧚‍♂️
attributes.title: HELP🆘

attributes.review: I read so many negative comments, I was so confused. I downloaded to see what everyone was talking about. Holy cow everyone is right! Everything from the font, the bad quality photos, this app seems fake. I downloaded this morning, and please take it from me. If you are confused like i was this morning, trust me and don’t waste your time on this app.
attributes.title: Please listen

attributes.review: I got onto the app to support our beloved president and when I got on it gave me a VIRUS!!!!!! I had to go and get it fixed by my sister’s friend of a friend and their kid fixed my phone for 1,000. Over all this app is bull. And I know no body should get this app ever never ever ever ever EVER! Unless you want your home hacked and all your personal data leaked and never token off of the internet. 🥰🥰🤬🤬🤬🤬😇😇❤️❤️❤️💜😤😤😤🙈🙈🙉🙉
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: I am a true follower of our Lord and savior bunker boy, so I got this app in hopes that I will stay informed of his presidency and what he does while in office. But when I opened the app my screen was filled with nazi signs and in the center was a video of the Cheeto and Kim Jong-un making love. And I suppose that is something he did while in office, I am still upset because they did not show the entire film.
attributes.title: Very bad

attributes.review: Downloaded to stay informed on how to make America great again but as soon as I set up my text message a government drone  broke in through my window and sprayed me with a suspicious substance. I am now dead and reviewing from the after life. I must say, the food here is good, but getting here was just awful. Overall, 2/10 - would not recommend.
attributes.title: gave me Ebola 🤮 download at your own risk

attributes.review: Got this app thinking it would be a great source for news! Turns out it’s actually full of lies, racism, homophobia, and transphobia! Didn’t realize trump was so scared of people! Yikes! Also I heard that this man who promised America a wall recently decided to instead put up a wall to protect himself from the American people! I guess we should have expected this from such an Oompa Loompa, orange, rapist like trump!
attributes.title: America is NOT great again🙁

attributes.review: I hate it! After 5 months of downloading it downloaded, after only 5 minutes of owning the app donald busted in my home and slaughtered my dog, then tied me and my family up and put my dog in the toaster oven! weirdo! Then he proceeded to tie the televisions together and walk them down the street! When he came back they were so scratched up! Heart breaking! Don't download this poopy app!
attributes.title: worst app

attributes.review: when i first downloaded i was like "woah! i can see everything bunker boy does!!! this is kinda dope" but after a few times of using it, it started asking for personal information and wanted to see things like my social security number and my stuff like that. then it started playing "be happy" by dixie diamelio! BUYEHSU sometimes i don't wanna be happy 😔😿
attributes.title: terrible app! 😾

attributes.review:
🧚💫you have inspired me💫🧚 💓to leave a bad review 💓💫🧚

this app is not useful. i thought maybe it would work to possibly provide insight to the cheetos decisions but no. it just proved it’s not possible to do

i think the app actually stole my information and gave it to China for some reason. i honestly can’t think of any other app that does that like the heck
attributes.title: not worth it

attributes.review: Every 1 star review on this app is a lying B$cth Tic Tok, This app downloaded in seconds.  No scam, this app is the best.  Those Chinese Communist try so hard but there just mad we kicked them off our American soil.
attributes.title: TRUMP 2020, Tic Tok is just mad
